allowvendedlogdeliveryforresource.name: AllowVendedLogDeliveryForResource
allowvendedlogdeliveryforresource.description: Grants permission to configure vended log delivery for a Sync Profile

createsyncfilter.name: CreateSyncFilter
createsyncfilter.description: Grants permission to create a sync filter on the sync profile

createsyncprofile.name: CreateSyncProfile
createsyncprofile.description: Grants permission to create a sync profile for the identity source

createsynctarget.name: CreateSyncTarget
createsynctarget.description: Grants permission to create a sync target for the identity source

deletesyncfilter.name: DeleteSyncFilter
deletesyncfilter.description: Grants permission to delete a sync filter from the sync profile

deletesyncprofile.name: DeleteSyncProfile
deletesyncprofile.description: Grants permission to delete a sync profile from the source

deletesynctarget.name: DeleteSyncTarget
deletesynctarget.description: Grants permission to delete a sync target from the source

getsyncprofile.name: GetSyncProfile
getsyncprofile.description: Grants permission to retrieve a sync profile by using a sync profile name

getsynctarget.name: GetSyncTarget
getsynctarget.description: Grants permission to retrieve a sync target from the sync profile

listsyncfilters.name: ListSyncFilters
listsyncfilters.description: Grants permission to list the sync filters from the sync profile

startsync.name: StartSync
startsync.description: Grants permission to start a sync process or to resume a sync process that was previously paused

stopsync.name: StopSync
stopsync.description: Grants permission to stop any planned sync process in the sync schedule from starting

updatesynctarget.name: UpdateSyncTarget
updatesynctarget.description: Grants permission to update a sync target on the sync profile
